trans-unit.source: Safeguard your personal data and identity
trans-unit.target: Protêç i tiei dâts personâi e la tô identitât

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Surf the web and use your favorite apps freely without being tracked
trans-unit.target: Navighe sul web e dopre lis tôs aplicazions preferidis in libertât cence che ti spiin

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Keep confidential materials safe via our premium data encryption
trans-unit.target: Ten al sigûr lis informazions riservadis gracie ae nestre superlative cifradure dai dâts

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Blocks unknown entities from seeing your private data on risky public Wi-Fi and hotspots
trans-unit.target: Al impedìs a entitâts no cognossudis di viodi i tiei dâts privâts cuant che tu ti coleghis a ponts di acès e Wi-Fi publics

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Protection wherever you are, from restaurants to vacation rentals
trans-unit.target: Protezion dapardut là che tu ti cjatis, dai ristorants ae cjase des vacancis

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Browse and access content from all over the world
trans-unit.target: Navighe e viôt contignûts di dut il mont

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Shop on a regional server to get localized deals like cheaper airfare
trans-unit.target: Fâs compris suntun servidôr intun altri paîs par otignî ufiertis localizadis, par esempli tarifis aereis plui economichis

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN secures the connection between your device and the web. Here’s some of the most useful features your VPN offers:
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN al protêç la conession tra il to dispositîf e il Web. Ve chi cualchidune des plui utilis funzionalitâts ufiertis de tô VPN:

trans-unit.source: The top uses and benefits of using Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: I principâi ûs e vantaçs di Mozilla VPN
